/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene scene of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, adding depth to the vast expanse. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk, going about their day, adding a touch of life to the tranquil setting. The image is a beautiful representation of a typical day in Beijing, with its blend of nature and urban life.
